text: I am using C# / RestApi to attempt to grab all HubSpot Company and Contact information. I am doing a GET using this: <https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts?limit=50&properties=firstname&properties=address&properties=id&properties=city&properties=email&properties=state&properties=country&properties=phone&archived=false&properties=lastname|https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/objects/contacts?limit=50&properties=firstname&propert[â€¦]s=country&properties=phone&archived=false&properties=lastname>. Any idea how I can limit the retrieved records to only those LastUpdated since a particular date?

Has anyone run into HubDB dynamic pages not displaying the correct featured page image despite having the featured image column set up in the table settings? It is ignoring the featured image column and the set up featured image for the listing page and pulling a random image from the site's navigation... :thinkonk:
